sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ITM.*, PC.PRODUCT_DSCR FROM ITM_PRODUCT_CODES ITM, PRODUCT_CODES PC WHERE ITM.PRODUCT_CODE = PC.PRODUCT_CODE
(ITM.EXP_DATE >= SYSDATE OR ITM.EXP_DATE IS NULL)
(ITM.EXP_DATE < SYSDATE)
( TRIM(UPPER(ITM.PRODUCT_CODE)) LIKE TRIM(UPPER('%$search$%')) OR TRIM(UPPER(PC.PRODUCT_DSCR)) LIKE TRIM(UPPER('%$search$%')) )
ORDER BY ITM.MOD_DATE DESC
sqlMap.select: SELECT ITM.*, PC.PRODUCT_DSCR FROM ITM_PRODUCT_CODES ITM, PRODUCT_CODES PC WHERE ITM.PRODUCT_CODE = PC.PRODUCT_CODE AND ITM.ITM_PRODUCT_CODES_KEY = #value#

SELECT COUNT(ITM_PRODUCT_CODES_KEY) TOTAL FROM ITM_PRODUCT_CODES WHERE PRODUCT_CODE= #productCode#
AND ITM_PRODUCT_CODES_KEY <> #key#
(EFF_DATE BETWEEN #effectiveDate# AND #expiredDate# OR EXP_DATE BETWEEN #effectiveDate# AND #expiredDate# OR
#effectiveDate# BETWEEN EFF_DATE AND EXP_DATE OR #expiredDate# BETWEEN EFF_DATE AND EXP_DATE OR
EXP_DATE IS NULL) AND EFF_DATE <= #expiredDate#
(#effectiveDate# BETWEEN EFF_DATE AND EXP_DATE OR ((EFF_DATE >= #effectiveDate# AND EXP_DATE >= #effectiveDate#) OR EXP_DATE IS NULL))

SELECT ITM.*, PC.PRODUCT_DSCR FROM ITM_PRODUCT_CODES ITM, PRODUCT_CODES PC WHERE ITM.PRODUCT_CODE = PC.PRODUCT_CODE
(ITM.EXP_DATE >= TO_DATE(#effectiveDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY') OR ITM.EXP_DATE IS NULL)
((ITM.EFF_DATE <= TO_DATE(#effectiveDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY') AND ITM.EXP_DATE >= TO_DATE(#effectiveDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY'))
OR (ITM.EFF_DATE >= TO_DATE(#effectiveDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY') AND ITM.EXP_DATE <= TO_DATE(#expiredDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY'))
OR (ITM.EFF_DATE <= TO_DATE(#expiredDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY') AND ITM.EXP_DATE >= TO_DATE(#expiredDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY'))
OR ITM.EXP_DATE IS NULL)
AND ITM.EFF_DATE <= TO_DATE(#expiredDate#,'MM/DD/YYYY')
ORDER BY ITM.MOD_DATE DESC
